title: Hour 2: Realignment Accent
description:
Kirk Herbstreit and Keyshawn Johnson join the show to discuss the impact of realignment on College Football. The two also debate whether Arch Manning will live up to the hype. Plus Sam Acho hops on the show to discuss if the Cowboys should take more of the load off of Dak? Later Chad Johnson joins the show to debate where Justin Jefferson ranks among top WRs, and if Joe Burrow will lead the Bengals back to the Super Bowl. Last, the crew debates the Boston fanbase after LeBron calls Boston fans "racist as (expletive)."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Hour 2: How does realignment impact future of College Football?
